## [ Parameters ](/documentation/SpriteKit/SKTileMapNode/tileColumnIndex(fromPosition:)#parameters)

`position`The position in the tile map to check.

## [Return Value](/documentation/SpriteKit/SKTileMapNode/tileColumnIndex(fromPosition:)#return-value)

The tile map node object’s tile column index for the specified position.
